reference.description: Reference that may help in the location of the address.

isComplete.description: Indicates whether customer profile is complete.

corporateName.description: Name of the company. Used for corporate clients.

corporatePhone.description: Telephone number. Used for corporate clients.

stateInscription.description: State inscription. Used for corporate clients.

tradeName.description: Trade name. Used for corporate clients.

userProfileId.description: Unique ID associated with the customer profile.

orderForm.description: This is `null` since this request does not depend on any previously existing orderForm information in the platform.

orders.description: Information on each of the orders created.

allowChangeSeller.description: Indicates whether seller changing is allowed.

corporateDocument.description: Corporate document, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporateName.description: Company name, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporatePhone.description: Corporate phone number, if the customer is a legal entity.

documentType.description: Type of the document informed by the customer.

isCorporate.description: Indicates whether the customer is a legal entity.

profileCompleteOnLoading.description: Indicates whether profile is complete on loading.

profileErrorOnLoading.description: Indicates whether profile presents error on loading.

stateInscription.description: State inscription, if the customer is a legal entity.

tradeName.description: Trade name, if the customer is a legal entity.

isCheckedIn.description: Indicates whether order is checked in.

isUserDataVisible.description: Indicates whether user data is visible.

items.description: List of objects containing metadata on each item in the order.
Information on each item in the order.

bundleItems.description: Information on services sold along with the SKU. Example: a gift package.

isGift.description: Indicates whether item is a gift.

manualPriceAppliedBy.description: User that applied the manual price, if that is the case.

priceDefinition.description: Price information for all units of a specific item.

calculatedSellingPrice.description: Item's calculated unitary selling price in cents.

sellingPrices.description: Array of objects, each containing value (in cents) and quantity for the different rounding instances that can be combined to form the correctly rounded total.

quantity.description: Rounding quantity, meaning how many items are rounded to this value.

value.description: Value in cents for that specific rounding.

total.description: Total value for all units of the item in cents.

priceTags.description: Array of price tags, each of which, modifies the price in some way, like discounts or rates that apply to the item in the context of the order.

isPercentual.description: Indicates whether price tag value is applied through a percentage.

value.description: Price tag value.

productCategories.description: Object, where each field is an ID from `productCategoryIds`.

{ID}.description: Product category corresponding to the ID in the field key.

sellerChain.description: Sellers involved in the chain. The list should contain only one seller, unless it is a [Multilevel Omnichannel Inventory](https://help.vtex.com/pt/tutorial/multilevel-omnichannel-inventory--7M1xyCZWUyCB7PcjNtOyw4) order.

items.description: Seller.

sellingPrice.description: Selling price in cents. Note that this field may be subject to rounding discrepancies. We recommend retrieving data from the `priceDefinition` data structure instead.

orderGroup.description: Order group. Orders that involve different sellers are split into different orders of a same order group.

orderId.description: ID of the order in the Order Management System (OMS).

giftCards.description: Gift card information, if it applies to the order.

inUse.description: Indicates whether gift card is in use.

isSpecialCard.description: Indicates whether gift card is special.

value.description: Gift card value in cents.

transactions.description: Information on each transaction pertinent to the order.

referenceValue.description: Reference value for calculating interest rates, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

value.description: Value including interest, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

ratesAndBenefitsData.description: Information on rates and benefits that apply to the order.

rateAndBenefitsIdentifiers.description: List with rates and benefits identifiers.

teaser.description: List with rates and benefits teasers.

sellerOrderId.description: ID of the order in the seller.

shippingData.description: Shipping information pertinent to the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

availableAddresses.description: Array with information on the available addresses for the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

logisticsInfo.description: Array with logistics information. Each object in this array corresponds to an object in the `items` array, based on the respective `itemIndex`.

itemIndex.description: Index corresponding to the position of the object in the `items` array.

selectedDeliveryChannel.description: Delivery channel selected by the customer.

shipsTo.description: List of countries that the item may be shipped to.

items.description: Three letter country code.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

isPickupStore.description: Indicates whether it is the pickup store.

shippingEstimate.description: Shipping estimate. For instance, Three business days will be represented `3bd`.

transitTime.description: Transit time. For instance, "three business days" is represented `3bd`.

selectedAddresses.description: Array with information on the selected addresses for the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

value.description: Total value.
Value of the order.

transactionData.description: Information on each transaction pertinent to the order placed.

gatewayCallbackTemplatePath.description: Template of the gateway callback path, which may later be used to send information about the transaction.

merchantName.description: Name of the merchant responsible for the sale.

payments.description: Information on each payment pertinent to the transaction.

referenceValue.description: Reference value over which interests may be applied.

value.description: Total value to be paid in this payment.

transactionId.description: ID of the transaction in the platform.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

items.description: Information on each item in the cart.

priceDefinition.description: Price information for all units of a specific item.

calculatedSellingPrice.description: Item's calculated unitary selling price in cents.

sellingPrices.description: Array of objects, each containing value (in cents) and quantity for the different rounding instances that can be combined to form the correctly rounded total.

quantity.description: Rounding quantity, meaning how many items are rounded to this value.

value.description: Value in cents for that specific rounding.

total.description: Total value for all units of the item in cents.

priceTags.description: Array of price tags, each of which, modifies the price in some way, like discounts or rates that apply to the item in the context of the order.

isPercentual.description: Indicates whether price tag value is applied through a percentage.

owner.description: Identification of the responsible for the price tag.

value.description: Price tag value.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item the cart.

seller.description: The seller responsible for the SKU.

sellerChain.description: Sellers involved in the chain. The list should contain only one seller, unless it is a [Multilevel Omnichannel Inventory](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/multilevel-omnichannel-inventory--7M1xyCZWUyCB7PcjNtOyw4) order.

items.description: Seller.

sellingPrice.description: Selling price in cents. Note that this field may be subject to rounding discrepancies. We recommend retrieving data from the `priceDefinition` data structure instead.

logisticsInfo.description: Array with logistics information on each item of the `items` array in the `orderForm`.

itemIndex.description: Index of item in items array.

items.description: List of objects containing metadata on each item in the order.

required.description: Indicates whether the item is required.

messages.description: Array containing an object for each message generated by our servers while processing the request.

itemPurchaseConditions.description: List of objects containing purchase condition information on each item in the order.

sellerChain.description: Sellers involved in the chain. The list should contain only one seller, unless it is a [Multilevel Omnichannel Inventory](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/multilevel-omnichannel-inventory--7M1xyCZWUyCB7PcjNtOyw4) order.

availableDeliveryWindows.description: This object contains information about the delivery window available to the shopper.

startDateUtc.description: Delivery window starting day and time in UTC.

deliveryWindow.description: In case of scheduled delivery, this object will contain information on the delivery window selected by the shopper.

allowManualPrice.description: Permission to modify item price manually.

addressType.description: Address type.

complement.description: Complement to the address.

country.description: Country of the address. ISO three-letter code.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the address.

receiverName.description: Name of the receiver.

reference.description: Reference that may help in the location of the address.

clientPreferencesData.description: Object containing preferences from the client who placed the order.

optinNewsLetter.description: `true` if the client opted to receive newsletter from the store.

corporateDocument.description: Corporate document, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporateName.description: Company name, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporatePhone.description: Corporate phone number, if the customer is a legal entity.

documentType.description: Type of the document informed by the customer.

isCorporate.description: Indicates whether the customer is a legal entity.

profileCompleteOnLoading.description: Indicates whether profile is complete on loading.

profileErrorOnLoading.description: Indicates whether profile presents error on loading.

stateInscription.description: State inscription, if the customer is a legal entity.

tradeName.description: Trade name, if the customer is a legal entity.

invoiceData.description: Object containing information pertinent to the order's invoice.

isCheckedIn.description: Indicates whether order is checked in.

items.description: List of objects containing metadata on each item in the order.
Information on each item in the order.

bundleItems.description: Information on services sold along with the SKU. Example: a gift package.

isGift.description: Indicates whether item is a gift.

manualPriceAppliedBy.description: User that applied the manual price, if that is the case.

priceDefinition.description: Price information for all units of a specific item.

calculatedSellingPrice.description: Item's calculated unitary selling price in cents.

sellingPrices.description: Array of objects, each containing value (in cents) and quantity for the different rounding instances that can be combined to form the correctly rounded total.

quantity.description: Rounding quantity, meaning how many items are rounded to this value.

value.description: Value in cents for that specific rounding.

total.description: Total value for all units of the item in cents.

priceTags.description: Array of price tags, each of which, modifies the price in some way, like discounts or rates that apply to the item in the context of the order.

isPercentual.description: Indicates whether price tag value is applied through a percentage.

value.description: Price tag value.

productCategories.description: Object, where each field is an ID from `productCategoryIds`.

{ID}.description: Product category corresponding to the ID in the field key.

sellerChain.description: Sellers involved in the chain. The list should contain only one seller, unless it is a [Multilevel Omnichannel Inventory](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/multilevel-omnichannel-inventory--7M1xyCZWUyCB7PcjNtOyw4) order.

items.description: Seller.

sellingPrice.description: Selling price in cents. Note that this field may be subject to rounding discrepancies. We recommend retrieving data from the `priceDefinition` data structure instead.

itemsOrdination.description: Object containing information about the ordering of items within the orderForm.

ascending.description: Indicates whether the ordering is ascending.

criteria.description: Criteria adopted to order the items in the list.

loggedIn.description: Indicates whether the user is logged into the store.

marketingData.description: Object containing promotion data such as coupon tracking information and internal or external UTMs.

coupon.description: Sending an existing coupon code in this field will return the corresponding discount in the purchase. Use the [cart simulation](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/orderform#orderformsimulation) request to check which coupons might apply before placing the order.

messages.description: Array containing an object for each message generated by our servers while processing the request.

openTextField.description: Optional field meant to hold additional information about the order. We recommend using this field for text, not data formats such as `JSON` even if escaped. For that purpose, see [Creating customizable fields](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/docs/creating-customizable-fields-in-the-cart-with-checkout-api-1).

orderFormId.description: ID of the orderForm corresponding to a specific cart.

giftCards.description: Gift card information, if it applies to the order.

inUse.description: Indicates whether gift card is in use.

isSpecialCard.description: Indicates whether gift card is special.

value.description: Gift card value in cents.

transactions.description: Information on each transaction pertinent to the order.

referenceValue.description: Reference value for calculating interest rates, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

value.description: Value including interest, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

ratesAndBenefitsData.description: Information on rates and benefits that apply to the order.

rateAndBenefitsIdentifiers.description: List with rates and benefits identifiers.

teaser.description: List with rates and benefits teasers.

salesChannel.description: Attribute created by the seller, in their VTEX store configuration.

selectableGifts.description: Array containing the data of the item selected as a gift.

shippingData.description: Shipping information pertinent to the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

availableAddresses.description: Array with information on the available addresses for the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

logisticsInfo.description: Array with logistics information. Each object in this array corresponds to an object in the `items` array, based on the respective `itemIndex`.

itemIndex.description: Index corresponding to the position of the object in the `items` array.

selectedDeliveryChannel.description: Delivery channel selected by the customer.

shipsTo.description: List of countries that the item may be shipped to.

items.description: Three letter country code.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

isPickupStore.description: Indicates whether it is the pickup store.

shippingEstimate.description: Shipping estimate. For instance, Three business days will be represented `3bd`.

transitTime.description: Transit time. For instance, "three business days" is represented `3bd`.

selectedAddresses.description: Array with information on the selected addresses for the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

storePreferencesData.description: Object containing data from the store's configuration (stored in VTEX's License Manager).

totalizers.description: Array containing an object for each totalizer for the purchase. Totalizers contain the sum of values for a specific part of the order (e.g. Total item value, Total shipping value).

userProfileId.description: Unique ID associated with the customer profile.

value.description: Total value of the order without separating cents. For example, $24.99 is represented `2499`.

reference.description: Reference that may help in the location of the address.

corporateDocument.description: Corporate document, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporatePhone.description: Corporate phone number, if the customer is a legal entity.

documentType.description: Type of the document informed by the customer.

isCorporate.description: Indicates whether the customer is a legal entity.

profileCompleteOnLoading.description: Indicates whether profile is complete on loading.

profileErrorOnLoading.description: Indicates whether profile presents error on loading.

stateInscription.description: State inscription, if the customer is a legal entity.

tradeName.description: Trade name, if the customer is a legal entity.

invoiceData.description: Object containing information pertinent to the order's invoice.

isCheckedIn.description: Indicates whether order is checked in.

items.description: List of objects containing metadata on each item in the order.
Information on each item in the order.

bundleItems.description: Information on services sold along with the SKU. Example: a gift package.

isGift.description: Indicates whether item is a gift.

manualPriceAppliedBy.description: User that applied the manual price, if that is the case.

priceDefinition.description: Price information for all units of a specific item.

calculatedSellingPrice.description: Item's calculated unitary selling price in cents.

sellingPrices.description: Array of objects, each containing value (in cents) and quantity for the different rounding instances that can be combined to form the correctly rounded total.

quantity.description: Rounding quantity, meaning how many items are rounded to this value.

value.description: Value in cents for that specific rounding.

total.description: Total value for all units of the item in cents.

priceTags.description: Array of price tags, each of which, modifies the price in some way, like discounts or rates that apply to the item in the context of the order.

isPercentual.description: Indicates whether price tag value is applied through a percentage.

value.description: Price tag value.

productCategories.description: Object, where each field is an ID from `productCategoryIds`.

{ID}.description: Product category corresponding to the ID in the field key.

sellerChain.description: Sellers involved in the chain. The list should contain only one seller, unless it is a [Multilevel Omnichannel Inventory](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/multilevel-omnichannel-inventory--7M1xyCZWUyCB7PcjNtOyw4) order.

items.description: Seller.

sellingPrice.description: Selling price in cents. Note that this field may be subject to rounding discrepancies. We recommend retrieving data from the `priceDefinition` data structure instead.

itemsOrdination.description: Object containing information about the ordering of items within the `orderForm`.

ascending.description: Indicates whether the ordering is ascending.

criteria.description: Criteria adopted to order the items in the list.

loggedIn.description: Indicates whether the user is logged into the store.

marketingData.description: Object containing promotion data such as coupon tracking information and internal or external UTMs.

coupon.description: Sending an existing coupon code in this field will return the corresponding discount in the purchase. Use the [cart simulation](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/orderform#orderformsimulation) request to check which coupons might apply before placing the order.

messages.description: Array containing an object for each message generated by our servers while processing the request.

openTextField.description: Optional field meant to hold additional information about the order. We recommend using this field for text, not data formats such as `JSON` even if escaped. For that purpose, see [Creating customizable fields](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/docs/creating-customizable-fields-in-the-cart-with-checkout-api-1).

giftCards.description: Gift card information, if it applies to the order.

inUse.description: Indicates whether gift card is in use.

isSpecialCard.description: Indicates whether gift card is special.

value.description: Gift card value in cents.

transactions.description: Information on each transaction pertinent to the order.

referenceValue.description: Reference value for calculating interest rates, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

value.description: Value including interest, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

ratesAndBenefitsData.description: Information on rates and benefits that apply to the order.

rateAndBenefitsIdentifiers.description: List with rates and benefits identifiers.

teaser.description: List with rates and benefits teasers.

salesChannel.description: Attribute created by the seller, in their VTEX store configuration.

selectableGifts.description: Array containing the data of the item selected as a gift.

inUse.description: Indicates whether gift card is in use.

isSpecialCard.description: Indicates whether gift card is special.

value.description: Gift card value in cents.

transactions.description: Information on each transaction pertinent to the order.

referenceValue.description: Reference value for calculating interest rates, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

value.description: Value including interest, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

ratesAndBenefitsData.description: Information on rates and benefits that apply to the order.

rateAndBenefitsIdentifiers.description: List with rates and benefits identifiers.

teaser.description: List with rates and benefits teasers.

salesChannel.description: Attribute created by the seller, in their VTEX store configuration.

selectableGifts.description: Array containing the data of the item selected as a gift.

shippingData.description: Shipping information pertinent to the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

availableAddresses.description: Array with information on the available addresses for the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

logisticsInfo.description: Array with logistics information. Each object in this array corresponds to an object in the `items` array, based on the respective `itemIndex`.

itemIndex.description: Index corresponding to the position of the object in the `items` array.

selectedDeliveryChannel.description: Delivery channel selected by the customer.

shipsTo.description: List of countries that the item may be shipped to.

items.description: Three letter country code.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

isPickupStore.description: Indicates whether it is the pickup store.

shippingEstimate.description: Shipping estimate. For instance, Three business days will be represented `3bd`.

transitTime.description: Transit time. For instance, "three business days" is represented `3bd`.

selectedAddresses.description: Array with information on the selected addresses for the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

storePreferencesData.description: Object containing data from the store's configuration (stored in VTEX's License Manager).

totalizers.description: Array containing an object for each totalizer for the purchase. Totalizers contain the sum of values for a specific part of the order (e.g. Total item value, Total shipping value).

userProfileId.description: Unique ID associated with the customer profile.

value.description: Total value of the order without separating cents. For example, $24.99 is represented `2499`.

allowManualPrice.description: Permission to modify item price manually.

addressType.description: Address type.

complement.description: Complement to the address.

country.description: Country of the address. ISO three-letter code.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the address.

receiverName.description: Name of the receiver.

reference.description: Reference that may help in the location of the address.

clientPreferencesData.description: Object containing preferences from the client who placed the order.

optinNewsLetter.description: `true` if the client opted to receive newsletter from the store.

corporateDocument.description: Corporate document, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporateName.description: Company name, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporatePhone.description: Corporate phone number, if the customer is a legal entity.

documentType.description: Type of the document informed by the customer.

isCorporate.description: Indicates whether the customer is a legal entity.

profileCompleteOnLoading.description: Indicates whether profile is complete on loading.

profileErrorOnLoading.description: Indicates whether profile presents error on loading.

stateInscription.description: State inscription, if the customer is a legal entity.

tradeName.description: Trade name, if the customer is a legal entity.

invoiceData.description: Object containing information pertinent to the order's invoice.

isCheckedIn.description: Indicates whether order is checked in.

items.description: List of objects containing metadata on each item in the order.
Information on each item in the order.

bundleItems.description: Information on services sold along with the SKU. Example: a gift package.

isGift.description: Indicates whether item is a gift.

manualPriceAppliedBy.description: User that applied the manual price, if that is the case.

priceDefinition.description: Price information for all units of a specific item.

calculatedSellingPrice.description: Item's calculated unitary selling price in cents.

sellingPrices.description: Array of objects, each containing value (in cents) and quantity for the different rounding instances that can be combined to form the correctly rounded total.

quantity.description: Rounding quantity, meaning how many items are rounded to this value.

value.description: Value in cents for that specific rounding.

total.description: Total value for all units of the item in cents.

priceTags.description: Array of price tags, each of which, modifies the price in some way, like discounts or rates that apply to the item in the context of the order.

isPercentual.description: Indicates whether price tag value is applied through a percentage.

value.description: Price tag value.

productCategories.description: Object, where each field is an ID from `productCategoryIds`.

{ID}.description: Product category corresponding to the ID in the field key.

sellerChain.description: Sellers involved in the chain. The list should contain only one seller, unless it is a [Multilevel Omnichannel Inventory](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/multilevel-omnichannel-inventory--7M1xyCZWUyCB7PcjNtOyw4) order.

items.description: Seller.

sellingPrice.description: Selling price in cents. Note that this field may be subject to rounding discrepancies. We recommend retrieving data from the `priceDefinition` data structure instead.

itemsOrdination.description: Object containing information about the ordering of items within the orderForm.

ascending.description: Indicates whether the ordering is ascending.

criteria.description: Criteria adopted to order the items in the list.

loggedIn.description: Indicates whether the user is logged into the store.

marketingData.description: Object containIng promotion data such as coupon tracking information and internal or external UTMs.

coupon.description: Sending an existing coupon code in this field will return the corresponding discount in the purchase. Use the [cart simulation](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/orderform#orderformsimulation) request to check which coupons might apply before placing the order.

messages.description: Array containing an object for each message generated by our servers while processing the request.

openTextField.description: Optional field meant to hold additional information about the order. We recommend using this field for text, not data formats such as `JSON` even if escaped. For that purpose, see [Creating customizable fields](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/docs/creating-customizable-fields-in-the-cart-with-checkout-api-1)

orderFormId.description: ID of the orderForm corresponding to a specific cart.

giftCards.description: Gift card information, if it applies to the order.

inUse.description: Indicates whether gift card is in use.

isSpecialCard.description: Indicates whether gift card is special.

value.description: Gift card value in cents.

transactions.description: Information on each transaction pertinent to the order.

referenceValue.description: Reference value for calculating interest rates, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

value.description: Value including interest, in case it applies. Displayed in cents.

ratesAndBenefitsData.description: Information on rates and benefits that apply to the order.

rateAndBenefitsIdentifiers.description: List with rates and benefits identifiers.

teaser.description: List with rates and benefits teasers.

salesChannel.description: Attribute created by the seller, in their VTEX store configuration.

selectableGifts.description: Array containing the data of the item selected as a gift.

shippingData.description: Shipping information pertinent to the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

availableAddresses.description: Array with information on the available addresses for the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

logisticsInfo.description: Array with logistics information. Each object in this array corresponds to an object in the `items` array, based on the respective `itemIndex`.

itemIndex.description: Index corresponding to the position of the object in the `items` array.

selectedDeliveryChannel.description: Delivery channel selected by the customer.

shipsTo.description: List of countries that the item may be shipped to.

items.description: Three letter country code.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

isPickupStore.description: Indicates whether it is the pickup store.

shippingEstimate.description: Shipping estimate. For instance, Three business days will be represented `3bd`.

transitTime.description: Transit time. For instance, "three business days" is represented `3bd`.

selectedAddresses.description: Array with information on the selected addresses for the order.

addressType.description: Type of address. For example, `Residential` or `Pickup`.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address, in case it applies.

country.description: Three letter ISO code of the country of the shipping address.

geoCoordinates.description: Array containing two floats with geocoordinates, first longitude, then latitude.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.

storePreferencesData.description: Object containing data from the store's configuration (stored in VTEX's License Manager).

totalizers.description: Array containing an object for each totalizer for the purchase. Totalizers contain the sum of values for a specific part of the order (e.g. Total item value, Total shipping value).

userProfileId.description: Unique ID associated with the customer profile.

value.description: Total value of the order without separating cents. For example, $24.99 is represented `2499`.
